ygData.subject: Re: Erud's Tonic
ygData.msgSnippet: I must admit that this quest is very interesting and I believe it ties into the whole plot about how Moorodo was to be put to death for smuggling Vasty Deep
ygData.messageBody:
I must admit that this quest is very interesting and I believe it ties into
the whole plot about how Moorodo was to be put to death for smuggling Vasty
Deep water out of the City of Erudin. But I believe that the Tonic may still
be on the Dwarf. As far as I know there is no property room in the jail but
there is a guard in the room adjacent to the cell room that you can talk to.
He speaks of what happens to criminals in Erudin and how they are punished.
Is Eruds Tonic made out of the vasty deep water that was smuggled out by
Moorodo and his accomplice and then sold on the black marget as a potion
called Eruds Tonic?

NOTE: Criminals are put out to sea once they are dismembered. Actually they
are put in Eruds Crossing... Eruds crossing may hold the secret of where you
can obtain the Tonic. Is it at the depth of the crossing from previos people
who attempted to steal the Tonic?

I will have to research this further since the plots seem to run parallel...
perhapse the Dwarf was tricked by Moorodo to get the Tonic and Moorodo is
trying to trick you also. The Dwarf talks about how he wants you to help him
get out of jail... I think that if you concentrate on this then he will give
or lead you to the Tonic.

Just some brainstorming.

Mushin
Enchanter

-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Matthews <tmatthews@...>
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 7:41 PM
Subject: [EQ-Quest] Erud's Tonic


>From: Tom Matthews <tmatthews@...>
>
>I went west a while ago to sell items....well a friend requested 2 items
>if I could pick them up for him. They are for a quest for a Bartender's
>Book in Freeport. Two of the items are a Kolandi (sp?) fish from Temple
>of Life in Qeynos (found that, loved the faction hit didnt know you
>could p/o a Diety) the other was Erud's Tonic now that's where I dead
>end. Supposedly it's sold at a merchant in Erudian, well I checked every
>single merchant on the isle (and had Erudians check the ones who
>wouldn't talk to me) and none sold it (Side Note: Picked up Innorukk's
>Kiss of Death, Lore Item, any ideas what it's for?).
>
>Four NPCs talk about Erud's Tonic...One is Mordoor (something) a Erudian
>near Crow's in Qeynos, he says he's sick and needs Erud's Tonic which
>supposedly is sold in Erudian according to him (side note: to poison him
>is a different quest), Second NPC is (something) Bluehawk in Bluehawk's
>in Erudian, he says Erud's Tonic is not for travelers, even to Erudites,
>the Third NPC is the Bookworm (forget name, she will say bookworm when
>hailed) in the Library in Erudian, she says Erud's Tonic should not be
>spoken of,......and last but not least there the Gnome in the Erudian
>jail, ask him and he says, he did not know you could not leave Erudian
>with Erud's Tonic and please get him out of jail. Now my ultimate
>decision maybe to kill the Gnome maybe he still has it on him but I
>really don't want to take a faction hit like that, beside with this one
>quest you become a hunted person by two major groups.
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>It's finally here! What's your opinion?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Create a Star Wars discussion group at ONElist.
